In the early 1990s, [[Mike Diana]] became the first American artist to receive a conviction for obscenity for drawing cartoons that were judged legally obscene.
In the early 1990s, [[Mike Diana]] became the first American artist to receive a conviction for obscenity for drawing cartoons that were judged legally obscene.

[[Child pornography]] is censored in the Unites States. And even if not obscene, is not considered protected speech, according to [[New York v. Ferber]].

[[Child pornography]] is censored in the Unites States. And even if not obscene, is not considered protected speech, according to [[New York v. Ferber]].<ref>http://www.firstamendmentcenter.org/news.aspx?id=8623</ref><ref>http://www.nytimes.com/2002/04/17/us/excerpts-from-opinions-in-ruling-on-the-child-pornography-prevention-act.html</ref>
